content: @Eric Huss As part of the Rust 2021 edition planning we're trying to make sure that each item for the 2021 edition has a Editiom team liason (who is in charge of status updates, tracking, planning, etc.) and an "owner" (who is doing the actual work of making the change a reality). I will be the liaison for the Cargo resolver v2. Can I put you down as the "owner" of this work since you've done much of the implementation so far?
yep! I've been planning to do the implementation very soon.
